files.name: rules1.drl
files.content: package org.ufes.inf.test.test1;import java.util.ArrayList;import java.util.HashMap;dialect  "mvel";declare Plate id: Integer;name: String;end;declare Car id: Integer;name: String;end;

files.name: rules2.drl
files.content: package org.ufes.inf.test.test2;import org.ufes.inf.test.test1.*;dialect  "mvel";declare Person id: Integer;name: String;temperature: Float;cars: ArrayList @type(Car);end;rule "Fever" when $p: Person(temperature > 37);then System.out.println($p + " is running a fever.");end;rule "Person has car" when $c: Car(name == "Higor's Car");$p: Person(cars contains $c);then System.out.println($p + " has " + $c);end;
